Here we list some applied papers that have utilized p-value/confidence/compatibility functions in their analyses. They do not necessarily use R to compute and graph these functions.

1. [Marsh GM, Ierardi AM. Confidence interval function analysis to evaluate the risk of mesothelioma among an expanded international cohort of cosmetic talc miners and millers. Regulatory Toxicology and Pharmacology. 2020; 104696. doi:10/ggzfsj](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.yrtph.2020.104696)
